Great rip, but PS3 users beware: like all of the other brrips of this movie I\'ve checked, it\'s protected by Cinavia.  Be prepared to play large chunks of the move at 1.5x or else have the audio periodically muted by the DRM.

Currently watching this on my PS3 thru PS3 Media Server. nnSound disappeared in first 2 minutes, and video seized.  Stopped playback.  Forced transcode with Mncoder for about 3 minutes, stopped transcode, then played without it, from beginning and all is good.nn
